message.content:
cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.OS, cs.AR 

The paper discusses a software-based capability model for memory protection in C and C++ programs, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed mechanism also has potential applications in type safety, thread safety, and garbage collection, which are related to programming languages (cs.PL), software engineering (cs.SE), and operating systems (cs.OS). Additionally, the paper discusses techniques for optimizing metadata management, which could be relevant to computer architecture (cs.AR).
